name: The Marsh King: Learning Project to Explore Bitsy
name_original: The Marsh King: Learning Project to Explore Bitsy
description:
A game I created in under 24 hours to explore the features of Bitsy and learn how to use it at a basic level.

The skeletal story I created for the sake of generating game elements and figuring out Bitsy's controls is about a little girl, named Pixelle (taken from my social media moniker, RoshellePixelle) who finds herself wandering a marsh.

She encounters various animals, creatures and items as she explores the marsh and tries to find a way home. Along the way, she uncovers dire warnings and stories about some thing or someone called The Marsh King, and she realizes a little too late that she is in critical danger.
